1.content:
You are Adam a typical 14 year old geeky boy. you have few friends, I mom ( Sarah) 35 could still be a supper model if she wanted to, your father ( James) 39 architect. and then there is your older sister Linda she is only a a year old but she is every thing you are not at school( Popular)

It is an brisk fall day and you are walking home form school. you are forced to take a short detour as you normal way home was blocked due to the rode being torn up and repaired.
As you pass behind the Junk yard you spot a USB memory stick on the side of it is written. " REALITY Machine stick simply plug in and enjoy".

You rush home to see what if any information is on the stick and if it might be able to sell the information to some one.
you turn on your moms computer since yours is still out for repairs. you plug in the USB stick and instantly a program loads. " REALITY CONTROL 2.0" with options

1) life swap
2) Fiction
3) Horror

11111.content:
"mom?! Are you okay," Adam asked as he came running into the kitchen.


Absently looking towards Adam, his mother says, "what I am doing in the kitchen? I was just on the computer looking through the internet. What!? Huh? I'm not mom. Why are you calling me 'mom' Mom? I'm Adam."


Confusingly, Adam looks at the person who looked like his mom and said, "Wait, you think you're adam?"


It suddenly dawned on Adam that the computer program actually worked.

11121.content:
As good as it feels, you know this is wrong and you have to stop it. Your mom is acting crazy and you have to put an end to this before someone finds out what you two are doing. What if your dad catches you two together like this?

"Mom, stop!" you yell out.

Her head jerks upwards suddenly, surprised. Then she smirks, thinking that you're still role-playing. "Come on, son. You know you want this. Let Mommy give it to you."

"Mom, cut it out. What if Dad catches us? This is wrong, okay? We have to stop it."

"Ugh," your mom utters, backing away. "You know, I was really in the mood there. I don't know why you have to ruin it by not sticking to the role playing right. You know we never talk about people catching us together."

"Mom, I ..."

"Just stop. We're not role-playing anymore."

"Mom, what are you ..."

"Stop role-playing! I'm not in the mood anymore."

Obviously, you're confused. You're not role-playing or whatever. You're just trying to speak to her.

She leaves the room in a huff, leaving you alone. On the computer, you see a screen stating LIFE CHANGE COMPLETE.

As you approach the computer, you realize what must have happened. This computer program ... it really could change reality! And without really thinking about it, you just switched lives with your dad. So that means that ... oh god ... your mom thinks that she's married to you. But ... if you have your dad's life, then what about your dad?

You try to reverse whatever you did, but the program tells you that you can't, that only one change per day is permitted.

"I have to stay like this for an entire day?" you mutter to yourself, your eyes wide.
11121.title: Stop Her

1113.content: Just then, you hear your sister's ringtone, and notice her phone sitting in front of you. You assume she must've left it there from when she used your mom's computer, but wonder why you hadn't noticed it until now. It seems your sister just got a text. What do you do?

info.brief_description: You are a 14 year old boy named Adam and you find a strange USB stick marked NEW REALITY
info.description:
You are a 14 year old boy named Adam and you find a strange USB stick marked "NEW REALITY" this USB stick when plugged in to a computer will let the user change reality

- the user of the reality machine can only alter reality once per day

- if you decide to swap lives you will only swap lives not bodies at first but if you swap lives with the other gender reality will try to fix that by shitting your body to match your new reality.

rules

1) have fun
2) try to keep proper spelling and grammar as much as possible.
3) no killing
